response.overview: In Lucas Entertainment's Lucas on Top, indulge in FIVE explosive scenes of Michael Lucas introducing himself in the best way possible...with footage of some his best scenes that he has both starred in and directed. Also included is behind-the-scenes impressions of his co-stars. Lucas believes that, like his beloved city of New York, "sex can be romantic, or it can be raunchy, or it can be romantic and raunchy at the same time." He proves it with this video, which also includes a trio of hard-core scenes-with Jackson Price and Lucas discoveries Aaron Heights and Christophe Blanc-that were shot especially for Lucas on Top.
response.title: Lucas On Top
